step1Desc:
Esim: Pizza, Texmex, Kebab, Kasvisruoka.

This list is visible in retaurant listing for customers to quickly know what types of foods do you offer. They are presented in the order you select them.

step2Desc:
Esim: Appetizers, Pizzas, Pastas, Sallads, Beverges.
These are groups under which you can add individual dishes. They can be same or different than Food groups.

step4Desc: Mistä ainesosista ateria muodostuu. Esim: Kanaa, Vuohenjuustoa, Jalapenoa, Ruccolaa
